    Class Description
    BoardPrinter
    Brief Contains all the needed methods for the printing of the game board

    Brief Class responsible for the printing of textual tables and the handling of the console's cursor's position

    Brief Reader class for the CLI that saves the input in the memory once read
    CLIView
    Brief Creates a textual representation of the gaming scenario
